meta.title: PT Fish Modern Success - Premium Seafood Supplier
meta.description: Indonesia's premium seafood supplier and exporter specializing in Frozen Tuna, Red Snapper, Grouper, and various export-quality fish products.

hero.description: ISO-certified frozen fish supplier. Direct from Indonesian waters to your market. Consistent quality, competitive pricing, reliable logistics.

about.label: About Our Company
about.description: Founded in 2025, we specialize in exporting premium Indonesian seafood to international markets. Our commitment: high-quality, safe products that meet global trade standards.
about.history: Officially registered with the Indonesian government (AHU) in 2026, ensuring full legal compliance and professional business operations.
about.focus: We export fresh and frozen seafood with a focus on quality, timely delivery, and customer satisfaction.

legal.title: Officially Licensed & Trusted
legal.desc: Registered and authorized by AHU Agency, providing security and trust guarantees for business partners.

quality.title: Focus on Product Quality
quality.desc: Strict raw material selection and product handling according to fishery export standards.

network.title: Strong Supplier Network
network.desc: Direct partnership with local fishermen and suppliers to maintain fish availability and quality.

international.title: International Market Orientation
international.desc: Understanding the needs and standards of the global market in export fish trade.

sustainable.title: Sustainability Commitment
sustainable.desc: Supporting responsible and sustainable fishing practices.

tuna.name: Yellow Fin Tuna
tuna.description: Premium quality yellow fin tuna. Individually packed and labeled. Ready for international export.

snapper.name: Red Snapper
snapper.description: High-quality red snapper. Perfect for grilling, steaming, and frying. Export quality standard.

grouper.name: Grouper
grouper.description: Fresh grouper with firm meat texture. Highly sought after in Asian markets. Restaurant quality.

parrotfish.name: Parrotfish
parrotfish.description: Colorful parrotfish. Popular in Southeast Asian cuisine. Fresh from Indonesian waters.

mackerel.name: Mackerel
mackerel.description: Fresh mackerel rich in omega-3. Popular for grilling and smoking. Consistent daily supply.

coralgrouper.name: Coral Grouper
coralgrouper.description: High-value coral grouper. Highly sought after in Asian markets. Restaurant and hotel quality.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the leading Indonesian seafood exporter, delivering premium quality products globally while supporting
vision.highlight: sustainable fishing practices and long-term partnerships

mission.title: Our Mission
items: Deliver premium seafood that meets international food safety standards.
Build fair partnerships with local fishermen and sustainable practices.
Ensure product freshness through advanced cold-chain logistics.

location.title: Our Location
location.address: Jalan Ikan Lumba-Lumba, Mayangan Village, Probolinggo City, East Java Province

certificates.label: Export Compliance
certificates.title: Certified for International Trade
certificates.subtitle: Our facilities and processes meet international food safety and export requirements for global markets.
certificates.qualityDesc: PT Fish Modern Success maintains comprehensive certification for international seafood exports. All products are processed according to global food safety standards with complete traceability.

govCert.title: Government Registered Exporter
govCert.desc: Licensed by Indonesian authorities for international seafood trade. All necessary export permits and health certificates provided with each shipment.

exportReady.title: International Standards Ready
exportReady.desc: Products processed in facilities compliant with HACCP principles. Halal, FDA, and MSC certifications in progress. Current operations meet all Indonesian export requirements.

transparent.title: Complete Documentation
transparent.desc: Every shipment includes: Health certificates, origin certificates, packing lists, and inspection reports. Full traceability from catch to container.

certificates.additionalNote: We provide all documentation required by your country's import regulations. Samples and inspection welcomed for registered buyers.

gallery.label: Real Products
gallery.title: SEAFOOD PRODUCT GALLERY
gallery.subtitle: These are real photos from our products. What you see is what you get - premium quality seafood products from Indonesian waters.
gallery.note: All photos taken from our actual inventory and processing facilities

tuna.title: Premium Frozen Tuna - 20kg
tuna.description: Export quality frozen tuna with proper labeling

snapper.title: Fresh Red Snapper
snapper.description: High grade red snapper ready for export

mackerel.title: Fresh Mackerel
mackerel.description: Premium quality mackerel rich in omega-3

footer.brandDesc: Leading sustainable seafood exports. Delivering authentic Indonesian archipelago flavors to global markets with the highest quality.
footer.address: Jl. Ikan Lumba-Lumba, Mayangan, Probolinggo, East Java 67218
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe for market insights and price updates.

assistant.greeting: Hello! I am the PT Fish Modern Success AI Assistant. Ask me about our frozen tuna, shipping logistics, or product availability.

cta.title: READY TO GROW YOUR SEAFOOD BUSINESS?
cta.description: Partner with Indonesia's most trusted supplier. We ensure consistent supply, premium quality, and competitive prices for your market.
